Class LoginActivity

      • android.content.ContextWrapper

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class LoginActivity
extends android.app.Activity

    Description

    Activity to authenticate the user.

      • onRetainNonConfigurationInstance

        public java.lang.Object onRetainNonConfigurationInstance()
        Detaches the activity from the LoginTask and returns the task as last instance. This way the task is restored when the activity is immediately re-created.
        Overrides:
        onRetainNonConfigurationInstance in class android.app.Activity
        Returns:
        The login task if present and null otherwise.
